DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Adolescent Smoking Past Month Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no response to a question about use of dried leaves of the tobacco plant in the form of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe by a juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity that has occurred within the most recent 4 weeks or 30 calendar days before the present time.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Adolescent Smoking Past Month
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of dried leaves of the tobacco plant in the form of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe by a juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity that has occurred within the most recent 4 weeks or 30 calendar days before the present time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredDefinition: A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:Before the present time.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of juveniles between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: During the past 30 days, have
ReferenceDocuments.description: During the past 30 days, have you smoked part or all of a cigarette?
